Intro

HPOExplorer contains useful functions for working with the Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO). It allows you to create interactive phenotype network plots, as well as many other useful functions.

Installation

Within R:

if (!require("remotes")) install.packages("remotes")
if (!require("HPOExplorer")) remotes::install_github("neurogenomics/HPOExplorer")

library(HPOExplorer)

Documentation website

Getting started

A quick tutorial on how to get started with HPOExplorer.

Docker

HPOExplorer is also available via DockerHub. Click here for instructions on how to create a Docker or Singularity container with HPOExplorer and Rstudio pre-installed.
